00052 int List::Count(void)
00053 {
00054   int count = 0;
00055   Node *list = head_;  
00056   while (list)
00057   {
00058     count++;
00059     list = list->next;
00060   }
00061   return count;
00062 }

00079 void List::AddToEnd(struct Node **ppList, int value)
00080 {
00081   if (*ppList)
00082   {
00083     AddToEnd(&(*ppList)->next, value);
00084   }
00085   else
00086   {
00087     (*ppList) = MakeNode(value);
00088   }
00089 }

00092 {
00093   AddToEnd(&head_, value);

00105 void List::AddToFront(struct Node **ppList, int value)
00106 {
00107   Node* newHead = MakeNode(value);
00108 
00109   newHead->next = *ppList;
00110   *ppList = newHead;
00111 }

00124 void List::FreeList(struct Node *pList)
00125 {
00126   if (pList)
00127   {
00128     FreeList(pList->next);
00129   }
00130 
00131   delete pList;
00132 }

00146 void List::Insert(struct Node **ppList, int value, int position)
00147 {
00148   if (*ppList && position > 0)
00149   {
00150     Insert(&(*ppList)->next, value, position - 1);
00151   }
00152   else
00153   {
00154     if (position <= 0)
00155     {
00156       AddToFront(ppList, value);
00157     }
00158   }
00159   // Do nothing if we're at end of list and position > 0.
00160 }

00163 {
00164   Insert(&head_, value, position);

00179 struct Node *List::FindItem(struct Node *list, int value)
00180 {
00181   if (list && list->number != value)
00182   {
00183     return(FindItem(list->next, value));
00184   }
00185   else
00186   {
00187     return(list);
00188   }

00205 void List::Delete(struct Node **ppList, int value)
00206 {
00207   if (*ppList)
00208   {
00209     if ((*ppList)->number == value)
00210     {
00211       Node *temp = *ppList;
00212       *ppList = (*ppList)->next;
00213 
00214       delete temp;
00215     }
00216     else
00217     {
00218       Delete(&(*ppList)->next, value);
00219     }
00220   }
00221 }

00237 void List::Concat(struct Node **Destination, struct Node *Source)
00238 {
00239   if (Source)
00240   {
00241     AddToEnd(Destination, Source->number);
00242     Concat(Destination, Source->next);
00243   }

00283 void List::Insert(struct Node **ppList, int value)
00284 {
00285   if(*ppList == NULL || (*ppList)->number > value)
00286   {
00287     AddToFront(ppList, value);
00288   }
00289   else
00290   {
00291     Insert(&(*ppList)->next, value);
00292   }
00293 }

00326 void List::Merge(Node** ppList, Node** toAdd)
00327 {
00328   if (*ppList && *toAdd)
00329   {
00330     if ((*ppList)->number > (*toAdd)->number)
00331     {
00332       Node* temp = *toAdd;
00333       *toAdd = (*toAdd)->next;
00334       temp->next = *ppList;
00335       *ppList = temp;
00336       Merge(&(*ppList)->next, toAdd);
00337     }
00338     else
00339     {
00340       Merge(&(*ppList)->next, toAdd);
00341     }
00342   }
00343   else if (toAdd != NULL && *ppList == NULL)
00344   {
00345     *ppList = *toAdd;
00346     *toAdd = NULL;
00347   }
00348 }
00349 
00350 void List::Merge(List &rhs)
00351 {
00352   Merge(&head_, &rhs.head_);
00353 }
